lastSession.summary: Merged divergent branches (local think/push improvements + remote auto-fix/hooks optimizations)

shipped.summary: Merge divergent local and remote branches, resolve push.md conflict
Optimize /push: use direct Bash calls instead of sub-agents, auto-fix before verify
Consolidate duplicated sound/notification code, remove legacy notify_completion.py
Unify Stop hooks into single process with ctypes
Use sys.platform instead of platform.system() to avoid WMI deadlock on Python 3.13+
Improve handoff protocol with concrete steps and clearer command descriptions
Ensure .claude/ tracked in git (remove from gitignore), only ignore backups
Delete completed handoffs in /push instead of archiving (shipped already tracks them)
Handle Unicode characters in session-start hook output (Windows cp1252 fix)
Add migrate step to clean up old project-level SessionStart hooks
